text: Byron Moreno (born 23 November 1969) is a former Ecuadorian football referee. He has been suspended for his job, because he showed illegal red cards. He was also arrested in New York for the possession of the illegal drug heroin and was fined for drunk driving. Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Quito Category:Ecuadorian footballers
title: Byron Moreno
